summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Emilio Fernandez. The documents primarily focus on Luis Alberto Condom Cajigal and Alvaro Martin Fernandez Fox, detailing their connections to Cuban activities, anti-communist efforts, and potential involvement in gambling rackets. The documents outline Cajigal's recruitment into the anti-communist underground in Cuba, his contacts, and activities related to planning actions against the Cuban government. They also mention connections to individuals in Mexico and Miami.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Emilio Fernandez has no significance in the JFK context as the documents do not mention him.
